p: North hemispheric 2018‐like or larger concurrent hot day areas are rare in today's climate (+1 °C mean warming; IPCC, 2018), with a likelihood of occurrence of 16% in the multimodel median (Figure 6a). Using a present‐day period from 1988 to 2018 (with RCP8.5 forcing after 2005), the multimodel median probability of a GCWH18‐like event is reduced to 6% ( supporting information Figure S3).
